body.class: page sidebar-a-left sidebar-b-right sidebars-2 isblog homestyle

span.style: line-height: 1.3em;

p.span:
Email:
\n
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
P: 509-345-2541 | F: 509-345-2288
M-T 7:30 AM - 4:00 PM
Friday 7:30 AM - 3:30 PM

img.style: border: 0px none; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
border: 0px none; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: As we work through the kinks of an entirely new way of teaching, there are going to be technical difficulties. Here are a few tips to support you at home:

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-size: 7pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Be sure that your child is logging into Google Classroom with their Wilson Creek emails and passwords that have been assigned. They can get these from their 1

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 0.6em; vertical-align: super;

font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: period teacher if they don’t have them.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-size: 7pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Contact the classroom teacher if you are not able to get into their classroom.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: We will be continuing the use of Zoom as a meeting facilitator for the rest of the Wilson Creek School year. The Zoom meeting ID’s will be listed in your child’s Google Classroom as well as the meeting password. Please be sure that your child’s name is entered when they join a meeting. If you need assistance with this, contact the classroom teacher. Students are not required to join the Zoom office hours. The purpose of the office hour is to provide a personal contact with the teacher if your child needs help or just wants to say hi to their teacher!

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: We will still be following the Zoom Office Hour Schedule below:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;

div.p: Good morning Wilson Creekers! We are still working through some technical difficulties evolving Zoom and Google Classroom. We have found out that even though it feels great to scream at your current device, shake it around and set it back down **gently** simply will not help. At this time, we ask everyone to take a step back, go outside and enjoy the sun. We are working through the kinks and will reach out to student, parents and guardians as soon as we have some answers. We are all in this together and no student will be left behind. We are #WCstrong and we will prevail.

span.style: font-size: 18pt; color: #ff9900;
font-size: 18pt; color: #ff9900;

p.span: In front of the Ag building.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 4.5pt; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21;

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 4.5pt; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21;
span.br: As we try to accommodate each family and their unique set of needs, teachers will be reaching out to families this week (April 20-24th) via email, telephone or by mail to ensure classwork is sent to your family in the most effective way. Before we left on March 16th, student were given missing assignments for their 3rd quarter grades and packets for the start of 4th quarter. In order to move efficiently into 4th quarter we will be closing our 3rd quarter on May 1st. All missing assignments for 3rd quarter need to be turned in to the homework drop slot at the bus garage no later than end of day May 1st. As to the 4th quarter packets, the district highly suggests all students to turn in completed work for 4th quarter grade entry when completed. Teachers will be issuing new assignments every Monday morning at 10:00 am, to their google classroom, as well as sending out any paper packets in the mail to those who have requested packets. Teachers will be entering grades for work that has been completed each week to ensure each students are able to track their grade through this time. Teachers will have soft due dates for each assignment, if the assignment is not turned back into the district via mail slot or google classroom the assignment will be entered as a */missing assignment. The hard-due date for all classwork will be end of day June 10th.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21;

p.span:
Important Dates/Review:
• Teacher will reach out to families and students the week of April 20-24th.
• New google assignments will be dropped at 10:00 am, Monday mornings.
• Paper packets for those students not using google classroom will be mailed out Monday mornings.
• New classwork drop off has been created at the bus garage for students to submit complete class work. Look for the mail slot.

span.style: font-family: 'Segoe UI Emoji', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21;

div.p: Here is a helpful video on how to get going once you get the chromebook.
And here is a helpful video on how to get to google classroom .

Good afternoon Wilson Creekers! If you had signed your kiddos up for a device, we will be passing them out this Wednesday (April 15) from 10-12 pm, at the Commons entryway in the upper parking lot. The district will also send out notice via school messenger this afternoon to ensure we reach everyone that has signed up. Thank you.

If you missed the deadline to sign up for a device, please reach out to
\n
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
or
\n
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
right away.

li.a: Food At School Sites During Closure

div.p:
The mission of the Wilson Creek School is to provide:
A personalized education empowering students
to achieve at their maximum level

The Wilson Creek School District does not discriminate in any programs or activities on the basis of sex, race, creed, religion, color, national origin, age, veteran or military status, sexual orientation, gender expression or identity, disability, or the use of a trained dog guide or service animal and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The Civil Rights Compliance Coordinator is available to handle questions and complaints of alleged discrimination. If you have questions and/or concerns please call Sally Nelson (Civil Rights Compliance Coordinator)
\n
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
or Laura Christian (504/ADA Coordinator) Laura Christian
\n
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
or Ryan Shannon (Title IX)
\n
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
at Wilson Creek School District PO Box 46, Wilson Creek, WA 98860, phone 509-345-2541.

p.br:
El Distrito Escolar de Wilson Creek no discrimina en sus programas o actividades por motivos de sexo, raza, credo, religión, color, origen nacional, edad, condición de veterano de guerra o grado militar, orientación sexual, expresión de género o identidad, discapacidad o uso de perro guía entrenado o animal de servicio, y ofrece igualdad de acceso a los Boy Scouts y a otros grupos de jóvenes especificados. El empleado mencionado a continuación ha sido designado para atender consultas y quejas de supuesta discriminación: Sally Nelson, La directora,
\n
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
o Laura Christian
\n

o Ryan Shannon

Wilson Creek School District PO Box 46, Wilson Creek, WA 98860, telephono 509-345-2541.
